verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees הִנֵּ֤ה׀ <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu Behold bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh ye the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> 'av-Dei all [ye] servants יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD הָעֹמְדִ֥ים <WH5975> ha-'o-me-Dim stand בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> be-veit- in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> bal-lei-Lot. which by night

שְׂאֽוּ־ <WH5375> se-'u- Lift up יְדֵכֶ֥ם <WH3027> ye-de-Chem your hands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh; [in] the sanctuary וּ֝בָרֲכוּ <WH1288> U-va-ra-chu and bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

יְבָרֶכְךָ֣ <WH1288> ye-va-rech-Cha bless יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> mitz-tzi-Yon; thee out of Zion עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh, that made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> va-'A-retz. and earth
